items.sentence: I hope we can avoid making the same stupid mistakes we made last time.
I like the Terminator films because the special effects are fantastic.
The administration cannot but look for alternative sources of revenue.
We waited for Tom at the library for half an hour, but he didn't come.
Ever since he was a little boy, Tom dreamed of becoming a garbage man.
Do you really think you should be taking advice from someone like Tom?
Since Tom doesn't want to put on any more weight, he doesn't eat cake.
When everyone in the boat noticed the water was rising, they panicked.
Tom and Mary get on well together. They always sit next to each other.
Even if the sun were to rise in the west, I wouldn't break my promise.
